lead_paragraph: While the Germans gnaw their way house by house into Stalingrad the battle is now sweeping with almost equal intensity northwest of the city across the steppes between the Volga and the Don. In the city the Russians have lost the initiative; they can only defend themselves with desperate courage against ceaseless Nazi assaults.
